message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I'm initially offering it at $22,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle?

Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your perspective on the price.  While $22,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the product's benefits.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $18,000, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
